text.more:
It's a lab report about co-authorships on the topic of network theory from 2000-2006, visualizing the collaboration between authors and the number of publications by different authors.
When you move the mouse onto the node, you'll see the author name and how he/she is connected with others.
text.intro: It's a lab report about co-authorships on the topic of network theory from 2000-2006, visualizing the collaboration between authors and the number of publications by different authors.
text.title: Labreport
